definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: CPC's new prices took effect on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 中油的新油价已经在星期一生效。

sentences.english: The trapping of oil-phase during water flooding for water-wetted core was studied experimentally.
sentences.chinese: 对亲水岩心吸吮过程中油相的捕集规律进行了考察。

sentences.english: A hydrocracking catalyst with high selectivity to middle distillates was developed.
sentences.chinese: 开发了一种具有较高的中油选择性的加氢裂化催化剂。

sentences.english: Dispersion characteristics of oil drop size in air-lift internal loop reactor were studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了气升式内环流反应器中油滴的分散特性。

definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

fuel gas (coal gas, natural gas, methane etc)
to stir-fry rapidly using a high flame/to conduct a media blitz/to manipulate a stock market through large-scale buying and selling
